body_html:
Thanks Derek. If I understand the system correctly, there just needs to be a method that can be called to push the checkpoints all onto the chief node. Of course this would just be a snapshot that would be called at the end of training. I've been developing a distributed TF script for Intel and have a public repo if you all are interested in seeing what we've done. Best, Tony

body:
Thanks Derek.

If I understand the system correctly, there just needs to be a method that
can be called to push the checkpoints all onto the chief node. Of course
this would just be a snapshot that would be called at the end of training.

I've been developing a distributed TF script for Intel and have a public
repo if you all are interested in seeing what we've done.

Best,
Tony
